# Day 1 

0930 - 1030: **[lecture]** introduction to workshop and phylogenetic trees 

1030 - 1130: R demos (Intro to trees in R and Simulating nucleotide substitution models) 

1130 - 1230: **[lecture]** introduction to ancestral character estimation (ace in R)

1230 - 1330: lunch (bring your own!)

1330 - 1430: R demo: ancestral character estimation in R

1430 - 1530: **[live coding session]** Introduction to stochastic character mapping -- simulating event times 

1530 - 1630: R demos (simulating stochastic character mapping; fitting models with stochastic character mapping) 

# Day 2 

0930 - 1030: **[lecture]** Review of ancestral character estimation and stochastic character mapping

1030 - 1130: **[live coding session]** Birth death models 

1130 - 1230: **[lecture]** Intro to state-dependent speciation and extinction (SSE) models 

1230 - 1330: lunch

1330 - 1430: **[mix of live coding and demo session]** simulating state-dependent speciation and extinction (SSE) models 

1430 - 1530: **[mix of live coding and demo session]** fitting state-dependent speciation and extinction (SSE) models 

1530 - 1600: **[live coding and demo session]** ancestral state reconstruction with SSE models

1600 - 1630: End of day review
 
# Day 3

0930 - 1030: **[lecture]** Bayesian discrete trait analysis
 
1030 - 1130: **[live coding session]** setting up basic BEAST2 runs 

1130 - 1230: **[live coding session]** setting up a BEAST2 run on a remote server

1230 - 1330: lunch

1330 - 1430: **[lecture]** multi-type birth death (MTBD) models
 
1430 - 1530: **[live coding session]** setting up a MTBD BEAST2 run

1530 - 1630: Analyze BEAST2 output

# Day 4

0930 - 1030: **[live demo session]** Examine BEAST2 server run 

1030 - 1130: **[lecture]** Bayesian stochastic search variable selection

1130 - 1230: **[live demo session]** setting up BSSVS in BEAST2

1230 - 1330: lunch

1330 - 1430: **[lecture]** SAASI
 
1430 - 1530: **[live demo sesssion]** comparing discrete trait analysis and phylodynamics

1530 - 1630: Recap, conclusions and closing
